name: All Is Dust
text: This model gets +1 to Armor rolls if targeted by an attack with D1.

name: Speed Aura
text: All friendly TZAANGOR models that start their activation within 6" of this model get +1 SP.

name: Icon Of Flame
text: At the start of this model's activation roll a D6. On a 6 inflict 1 mortal wound on the closest enemy model within 12"
